mapper.sql:
FROM user a WHERE 1=1 AND a.userDelFlag = #{shDelFlag}
AND a.userName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userEmail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userPhone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.userAddr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.userSeq, a.userGender, a.userName, a.userId, a.userEmail, a.userPhone, a.userAddr, a.userDetailAddr, a.userRegDate, a.userModDate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pet WHERE 1=1 AND userSeq = user_userSeq) AS petCount
ORDER BY userSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
